titles.title: Winter Run Chinook Salmon Captive Broodstock Act of 1993
Winter Run Chinook Salmon Captive Broodstock Act of 1993
Winter Run Chinook Salmon Captive Broodstock Act of 1993
To direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a salmon captive broodstock program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Environment and Natural Resources.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Subcommittee on Environment and Natural Resources Discharged.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
Mr. Studds moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 5, rule I, the chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays (2/3 required): 335 - 85 (Roll No. 594).

action.text: The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported to Senate by Senator Baucus without amendment. With written report No. 103-298.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 504.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 11/20/1993--Passed House amended. Winter Run Chinook Salmon Captive Broodstock Act of 1993 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a salmon captive broodstock program, to be carried out in a manner consistent with the goals, priorities, and policies set forth in any recovery plan for winter run Chinook salmon in the Sacramento River developed by the National Marine Fisheries Service under the Endangered Species Act of 1973, and with findings of consultations regarding that population of salmon carried out pursuant to that Act. Prohibits the Secretary from implementing this Act unless at least 20 percent of amounts necessary to conduct the program are provided by non-Federal sources. Authorizes appropriations.
